question.text: In which year did the actor/actress {parameter1} start his/her career?
question.description: {parameter2} is the year of where {parameter1} started a career.
{parameter2} is the birth date of {parameter1}, for example.

question.text: Who is the writer as well as director of the movie {parameter1}?
question.sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?{parameter1} , ?{parameter2} WHERE { ?movie rdf:type dbo:Film . ?movie rdfs:label ?movieLabel . ?movie dbo:writer ?writer . ?writer rdfs:label ?writerLabel . ?movie dbo:director ?director . ?director rdfs:label ?directorLabel . ?director owl:sameAs ?writer . filter(langMatches(lang(?movieLabel),"EN")) . filter(langMatches(lang(?writerLabel),"EN")) . filter(langMatches(lang(?directorLabel),"EN")) . } OFFSET {offset}
question.description: {parameter2} is the writer and director of {parameter1}.
